title: Brand New Luxury Villa Escape with Decadent All-Inclusive Dining
description: Leave the hustle and bustle of daily life behind and escape on a picturesque island holiday. Lelewatu Resort Sumba is a brand-new luxury property nestled in the clifftops of Sumba Island, one of Indonesiaâ€™s undiscovered gems. Relax in your own villa with a private pool and soak up emerald rainforest views or shimmering ocean vistas, before feasting on delicious local cuisine at the beautiful Bokosawu Restaurant. Embrace tranquillity and spoil yourself with this incredible getaway that boasts all-inclusive dining, daily afternoon tea, a refreshing welcome cocktail, return airport transfers and much more.
offer_address: Jl. Lelewatu No.168, Wei Mangoma, Wanokaka, Kabupaten Sumba Barat, Nusa Tenggara Tim. 87272, Indonesia
